title: Educational Technology-Enhanced Language Instructional Design and Open Resource Development in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and foundational knowledge in language education
context.additional_context: Program where medical/legal/technical field experts participate in language education scenario design to strengthen practical applicability

learning_goals: Learners design collaborative learning activities with peers using Web 2.0 tools (blogs, wikis) at least three times.
Learners design one language education module in a VR simulation environment and share it as open educational resources.
Learners improve their learning designs at least twice by incorporating feedback from peers and experts through feedback loops.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
